Description:
Detects the use of NSudo tool for command execution

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - NSudo Execution
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%-u:s %' or command like '%-u:t %' or command like '%-u:e %' or command like '%-p:e %' or command like '%-m:s %' or command like '%-m:h %' or command like '%-u=s %' or command like '%-u=t %' or command like '%-u=e %' or command like '%-p=e %' or command like '%-m=s %' or command like '%-m=h %' or command like '%-showwindowmode:hide%') and ((process_path like '%
sudo.exe' or process_path like '%
sudolc.exe' or process_path like '%
sudolg.exe') and (original_file_name = 'nsudo.exe' or original_file_name = 'nsudolc.exe' or original_file_name = 'nsudolg.exe')))
